links.*: The Lord of the Rings Online: Mines of Moria (soundtrack)
Nimrodel / The Procession / The White Rider

wikitext.*:
'''Nimrodel''' can refer to:
==Middle-earth==
* [[Nimrodel]], a [[Silvan Elves|Silvan]] [[Elves|Elf]] from [[Lothlórien]] who was lost searching for [[Amroth|her lover]].
** ''[[Lay of Nimrodel]]'', a lay about her loss and her love for [[Amroth]], partially sung by [[Legolas]] in ''[[The Fellowship of the Ring]]''.
* [[Nimrodel (river)]], a river of [[Lothlórien]]. It is unclear whether the river or the Elf came first.

==Adaptations==
* ''[[The Falls of Nimrodel]]'', a track on ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Mines of Moria (soundtrack)]]'' by [[Chance Thomas]].
==Popular Media==
* "[[Nimrodel / The Procession / The White Rider]]", a song by [[Camel (band)|Camel]].
* "[[Nimrodel (Glass Hammer song)]]", a song by [[Glass Hammer]].

{{disambig}}
